form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS, NISN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS ADVENTIST HOSPITAL FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo. Day, Yr.) 04/06/1994 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at PORT-AU-PRINCE HAITI NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX MELITA (Mo., Day, Yr.) I certify that on the above date I examined CASTOR F M 06/10/1903 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 89-615069 04/03/1999 04/04/1994 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination vealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancrold Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Gonorrhea Tuberculosis, Not Active Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Granuloma Inguinale Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Syphills, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm Not Done DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DATE READ GEORGES MICHEL 03/25/1994 SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally rellable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done RPR ELISA TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY LAB DPT. ADV. HOSP. 03/25/94 ELIE ROBERT 03/28/1994 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT (S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS APHONY RECURRENT NERVE PARALYSIS. APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The Information on this form refers to me. 03-25-94 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE ISAAC A. YVON, M. D. Culpanic 04/06/1994 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 15. REVISED 2-88 U.S. Government Printing Office: 1991 - 286-971/20115 DEPT. OF STATE
